definition: Ningde prefecture level city in Fujian
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Probe into Ningde city fall acid rain frequency and relation of season in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 探討寧德市降雨中酸雨頻率與季節變化的關係。

sentences.english: The She Nationality is a main minority in Fujian, which mostly inhabits in Ningde, East Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 畲族大多聚居於福建省東部的寧德市。

sentences.english: The sources of rare and endangered wild plants in Ningde City of Fujian Province were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對福建省寧德市野生珍稀瀕危植物資源進行了調查。

sentences.english: It is one of the infrastructure completion investment regions in the present Ningde city.
sentences.chinese: 是目前寧德市基礎設施較爲完善的投資區域。
